page.title: 13LOCAL HISTORY 2 & EMPLOYMENT
page.content: The first day the well is connected, it is magic for that day only. From it's spout came marching toy soldiers who stride down a golden carpet and then blow dandelion seeds into the playground making brightly coloured rainbows. {FIONA MANN. } PRESENT LOCAL EMPLOYMENT {Sawmill}(Alexander Ballantyne) {Post Office}(Jack Hetherington) {Village Hall Caretaker}(Mrs.Davie) {The Plough-Public House}(Rob.Leitch) {Market Garden }(George Henderson) EMPLOYMENT IN THE PAST {Farming {Blacksmith {Innkeeper {Weavers {Stonemasons
